mapper.select: select cb_customer_idno from cp_csttbl where cb_user_code1=#{cbUserCode1}
select cb_member_code as cbMemberCode, cb_cardholder_name as cbCardholderName, dis_status as disStatus from cp_csttbl left join dis_user on cb_member_code=user_id and dis_id=#{disId}
